plants.germinationNeeds: Start seeds indoors or sow directly after the last frost. Needs warm soil (21°C) and light to germinate. Keep moist.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun, hot weather. Rich, moist, but well-drained soil. Pinch tips to encourage bushy growth.

plants.germinationNeeds: Difficult from seed. Best propagated from cuttings. Needs well-drained soil and sun.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun, well-drained, sandy soil. Drought-tolerant once established. Prefers slightly alkaline pH.

plants.germinationNeeds: Can be started from seed indoors. Needs light to germinate. Sprinkle seeds on surface and press lightly.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Light, well-drained soil. Drought-tolerant. Doesn't like wet feet.

plants.germinationNeeds: Start from seeds indoors 6-10 weeks before last frost. Needs light to germinate. Surface sow.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Well-drained soil. Thrives in moderate heat. Regular trimming encourages fuller growth.

plants.germinationNeeds: Seeds can be slow to germinate. Soak seeds overnight before planting. Sow in spring. Prefers soil temps of 21°C.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun to partial shade. Rich, moist, well-drained soil. Benefits from consistent watering.
